alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 11:46AM AKDT until October 25 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with periods of low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. West winds gusting to 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds will develop this afternoon and continue into tonight. There will be brief periods of low visibility in snow and blowing snow. Winds will decrease Wednesday morning and conditions will improve then. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
